alert.note: Alert for Towns; Union; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Towns, northern White and Union Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 307 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Ivy Log to Track Rock to Anna Ruby Falls, and moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blairsville, Helen, Unicoi State Park, Owltown, Robertstown, Blue Mountain Shelter, Vogel State Park, Track Rock, Anna Ruby Falls, Nottely Dam, Ivy Log and Low Gap Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
